A master of explosions and firearms. Ao Bai's expertise with firearms allows him to control two weapons at the same time. Also, due to his passion for explosions, he has always been able to make powerful explosives.

A mysterious visitor from the Spirit Realm who is proficient in alchemy and the elemental arts. With his expertise in alchemy, the Crown Prince is able to trap and freeze the movement of his enemies with his Energy Orb. His hidden talents and background make him even more closely in tune with the elements, allowing him to combine them skillfully to create extraordinary effects.

Qing Yan is a skilled martial artist who moves like the wind and is as elusive as the shadows. Unlike others, he dislikes alchemy and shields and instead indulges in close quarters combat and armor. With his martial art prowess, Qing Yan leaps into the fray to cleave enemies. With that being said, he also enjoys the smoke and sounds of a shotgun.
Artillery shells can break enemies' barriers!
Challenge succeed! The Treasure Chest has been opened!
Challenge failed! The Treasure Chest is locked!
As you have already made a challenge, the energy of the portal has dissipated...
Contains a small amount of ammo.
Contains a small amount of copper.
Specialty bun of the tomb. One bite is enough to restore your HP.
Can pierce the barrier of large ships.
A mysterious bun filled with an unknown filling. Recovers 30% HP.

A winged beetle that appears in underground tombs that has grown a horn due to the stimulation of demonic aura. Despite its weak constitution, it is extremely aggressive and tends to appear in groups.

A unique mammal of the Anxi Desert. Rumored to have been domesticated by exiled bandits, it usually appears in a group to plunder caravans. Don't be deceived by its petite, tender appearance and weak body as it is extremely aggressive.

A common coyote species of the Anxi Desert known to be more ferocious than bandits. These coyotes have mastered the ability to sting their enemies from afar with their tail stinger, and have terrified many with their vicious bite.

This primitive desert creature that lives under the desert likes to stick its head out to observe its surroundings. When it feels threatened, it will attack its enemies with a fluid it secretes from its mouth.
A terracotta soldier that throws powerful explosives. No one knows why these rare terracotta soldiers were awakened. An un-ending supply of strong explosives is their only means of attack.
A terracotta soldier that throws fire grenades. Unlike normal explosives, the fire caused by these grenades Burns for a long time.
A terracotta soldier that throws lightning grenades. Unlike normal explosives, the lightning unleashed by these grenades paralyzes enemies.
A terracotta soldier that throws poison grenades. Unlike normal explosives, these grenades leave a pool of venom after exploding.

A sword-wielding terracotta soldier that should be more common than Crossbowmen, but for some reason very few Foot Soldiers were awakened by the demonic aura. Foot Soldiers seem to only be able to charge the enemy and swing their swords.

A heavily armored terracotta soldier that has forgotten its guard responsibilities after being awakened by the demonic aura. Demonized right spearmen are skilled at charging its enemies and attacking them.
This type of rogue swordsman has learned martial arts and awakened the power of thunder and lightning with the inspiration of its gods.

Crossbowman is the most common type of terracotta soldier and can be seen everywhere in the tomb. After the awakening, Crossbowmen lifted their millennia-old crossbows to continue performing their duty.
This common terracotta soldier is the vanguard in the army and is responsible for defending against arrows from enemies.
A bandit with a primitive weapon who no longer lives in the danger of poverty. They always keep their distance.

As a bully among other bandits, the dark-faced bandit is massive and have the authority which matches his size. The heavy armor makes him a nightmare to fight, only the scar on the back of his armor represents the past mistake due to being arrogant and reckless.
After their awakening by the demonic aura, Horseheads raised their giant shields to continue guarding the most important door of the palace.
This giant terracotta soldier is equipped with a giant heavy crossbow. There seems to be nothing special about them other than their massive size and powerful crossbows that match their size.
A type of bandit that claims to be a hermit. Their noble demeanor they wear is something used to cover up their despicable actions and nature.

Unlike Crossbowman, Longbowmen wear heavy armor to match their cumbersome crossbow. Longbowmen are able to shoot powerful arrows consecutively, which makes them a dangerous presence in the Longling Army.
This tactician loves hiding in the dark to sneakily attack and terrorize its enemies.
Although it has no idea about the art of war, it has erratic skills. Bandit retainers have just as good eyes as tacticians and enjoy attacking enemies remotely.

This uncommon bandit is large and stupid, but will charge its targets fearlessly. This terracotta soldier often carries an explosive oil barrel and will suppress their enemies with a stream of burning oil.
This terracotta soldier's head is made of saltpeter, with the demonic aura filling up the empty space in their head. This soldier exists only for explosions and sacrifice.
Flames and demonic aura fill their hollow heads. Could there be anything else in their heads other than explosions and sacrifice?
Lightning and demonic aura fill their hollow heads. Could there be anything else in their heads other than explosions and sacrifice?
Poison and demonic aura fill their hollow heads. Could there be anything else in their heads other than explosions and sacrifice?
A terracotta soldier that was awakened alongside the Horseheads. The throwing spear wielded in his hand is offered unlimitedly by the demonic aura.
A lizard tribe that excels in witchcraft and flame manipulation. They have a powerful body unlike other wizards and attack enemies who try to approach them with their bone staves.
A mutant among coyotes that was demonized by the dense demonic aura. It has strong attacks and can even launch magic orbs.
An extremely rare type of terracotta soldier. Demonic aura fills their giant bodies and makes them stronger than most ordinary Horseheads.

Sand Lizard Priest. Its superb magic proficiency allows it to use multiple orbs at the same time. It also loves to summon giant fireballs with its chant. Naturally, it inherited the same habit of collecting skulls.

Mythic Beast-Lu Wu. This tiger-shaped beast has three tails, a human face and tiger claws. It can move stones and pass freely through the mountains. For some reason, it stands guard inside the palace.

The Ichthyosaurus was originally a mount of the gods. It resides deep within the sea of clouds and is extremely hard to track. Its offspring made their way into the desert sea for some reason. Having lost the ability to ride the clouds, they can only swim in the sand.
The Craftsman seems to know a lot about the Peddler, but the Peddler, on the other hand, despises him.
According to the Craftsman, the Peddler used to drop by to have his weapons inscribed, but he never had much luck.
The Craftsman denies that the Peddler's weapon was forged by him.
There is no strongest inscription, only the most appropriate build.
Gemini inscriptions can be re-inscribed by the Craftsman.
Elemental weapons are the perfect combination of alchemy and artifice.
The Spirit Realm was built by the Ancients.
The Spirit Realm was first established with the purpose of fighting against the Demonic Aura and protect the world.
The Spirit Realm has been still and silent for a long span of time, until now.
Soul Essence is refined by using your will and energy to introspect rather than just looting your enemies.
Heroes from all over the world gather together in the inn, among whom Master Bao was well respected.
The Yoruhime-Maru's keel was taken from an ancient dynasty's ship.
The Craftsman's sledgehammer which is used to inscribe weapons terrifies the Justice!
Evil is rooted in the heart of every being's spirit.
Not every weapon is made to be dual-wielded by Ao Bai.
Every weapon has its own unique traits and abilities. Read the weapon's description carefully to fully understand its use!
Some weapons have different firing modes.
Both of your weapons must have the same Gemini Inscription for it to take effect.
Every weapon type has its own exclusive Inscription.
The Craftsman has the ability to enhance a weapon's power or re-inscribe its Gemini Inscription.
The right inscription can greatly enhance your weapon's power.
Inscriptions can be divided into 4 types: Common Inscriptions, Rare Inscriptions, Exclusive Inscriptions, and Gemini Inscriptions.
Weapons with the piercing inscription allow it to pierce shields.
Choosing the right combination of Ascensions is of the utmost importance when adventuring.
Level 3 Ascensions are extremely powerful, and usually give you a secondary bonus or take away a negative effect.
Carefully select which Occult Scrolls to hold onto. More Occult Scrolls does not always equal more power.
Some Occult Scrolls are not suitable for your current play-style, and it would be a good idea to discard them.
An Occult Scroll's power lies not only in its rarity or effect, but also in whether the Occult Scroll itself is suited to your current Ascension path.
Due to your backpack having limited space, you're only allowed to carry two weapons at a time, so choose them wisely!
If you're having a hard time choosing your play-style, consider the weapons, scrolls and Ascensions you have.
All Weapon DMG bonuses and some Skill DMG bonuses are applied to explosive weapons.
Breaking the glowing cracks on the walls will reveal a portal to a hidden area called “The Vault”.
Don't be greedy! Peculiar Chests should be opened in moderation, as they don't just always contain good things.
Sometimes the Cursed Soccult is a present. Try to turn it into an assistance in your journey.
Some Occult Scrolls will be useless or even harmful to your play-style and can be freely discarded most of the time.
The Ichthyosaurus Offspring's scaly armor protects it from most damage, so you need to discover its weakness in order to defeat it!
Well-timed dashing can help you escape all kinds of danger.
There are plenty of objects that can be broken all over the map, and you'll usually find various supplies in them.
Hitting the weakness of an enemy will cause massive damage, this is usually called a "Crit".
As your Lucky Shot Chance increases, so does your maximum damage.
All monsters have weakness, and the Monster section in your Logbook may reveal these weaknesses to you.
You can only purchase one Occult Scroll from the Peddler every encounter, unlike other supplies.
Weapons and scrolls can be dropped and shared with your teammates. Effective communication and teamwork are keys to success.
Explosive barrels often appear on adventures, and they can either be a help or a hindrance.
Lightning damage has a chance to deal Shock, Fire damage has a chance to deal Burn, and Corrosive damage has a chance to deal Decay.
There are 5 types of damage: Normal damage, Fire damage, Corrosive damage, Lightning damage, and True damage.
It's hard to penetrate armor with Normal damage, try to use a weapon that deals Corrosive damage!
Lightning damage can effectively break Shields, but is less effective against Flesh and Armor.
Fire damage can effectively damage Flesh, but is less effective against Shields and Armor.
Corrosive damage can effectively penetrate Armor, but is less effective against Flesh and Shields.
True damage won't get affected by the defense type
Different elemental effects can be triggered at the same time to create an entirely new effect.
There are three Fusion Effects: Miasma, Combustion, and Manipulation.
Heroes are not affected by Fusion Effects.

Has a chance to launch a small missile upon shooting.
+35% total weapon DMG against enemies within 8m, but -50% effective range.
(Gemini) Plant spores on hit. The amount of spores is equivalent to on-hit Projectiles and Projectiles of the other weapon. When the amount reaches 30, deals additional Weapon DMG to the target.
Projectile +1 for next shot when hitting 3 targets in a single shot.
Hitting 3 enemies in a single shot restores 1 ammo which +30% base DMG to the magazine.
Double the projectile for next shot when hitting 2 targets in a single shot.
+0.4x CritX for 4s when make 4 Crit Hit in 2s (bonus can stack)
Weapon's Elemental Effect chance will increase 50% of its base chance for each enemy hit by the hero (up to 500% of its base chance, resets on inflicting an elemental effect.)
Scope in to mark two enemies by aiming at them. Additional crit DMG will be dealt in each DMG.
When scope is on for 0.5s, hits deal Crit DMG
Restore 10% ammos to magazine when triggering Elemental Effect.
Magazine Capacity becomes 2. When the first shot kills the enemy, recovers 1 ammo to the magazine. Otherwise, +200% Lucky Shot Chance to the last shot.
After killing 5 enemies, bullets will home in on nearby enemies' weaknesses with +1.0x CritX for 10s.
+10% Lucky Shot Chance but -10% Accuracy briefly on each kill. (Up to 10 stacks)
80% chance to create a lightning ball on a crit hit.
80% chance to create a fire ball on a crit hit.
80% chance to create a corrosion ball on a crit hit.
Create a bullet to chase nearest enemy on Crit Hit.
Arrows deal additional AoE damage upon hitting an enemy.
Common wandering ghosts that hide in lanterns. They drive their paper-made body to absorb the life of enemy.
Wandering ghosts that are summoned by Corrupt Monks. Hiding in lanterns, with their anger igniting the fire, they attack their enemies by charging at them and exploding.
The pride of Catfish Warriors makes them prefer swords rather than guns.
Being equipped with exquisite firearms, the Catfish Gunner is still one of the bottom soldiers of Yoruhime-Maru's army.
Not proficient in escaping, the Catfish Ninjas toss shurikens while hiding behind the shell of the Clam Spirit.

It is said that Rogue Villains are somehow bound by blood with the Lizards. However, their humongous and heavier bodies prove otherwise. Rogue Villains that are entrusted with heavy responsibility love carrying a shotgun while monitoring their subordinates.
Wearing a ghastly mask, the Yaksha of the Seas was originally a ghost who was imprisoned under Jade Summit by the Spirit Realm. Somehow, it was released to provoke catastrophes all around the world.
The Catfish Man who proactively allies himself with Yoruhime-Maru is hardly a flattering one. Despite this, they are a rather a skilled archer.
White Shark has a fearful reputation that causes kids to cry at night. He especially likes to pull opponents close with his chain while watching them scream helplessly under his fearful gaze.
The Octopus is not a mere transport soldier for Yoruhime-Maru's army. Excelling in maneuvering a heavy machine gun enables him to be one of the most prominent forces.
They are proud of their bloodline. An inevitable attack awaits whoever makes fun of them.
A lizard tribe that excels in witchcraft and lightning manipulation. They have a powerful body unlike other wizards and attack enemies who try to approach them with their bone staves.
A lizard tribe that excels in witchcraft and poison manipulation. They have a powerful body unlike other wizards and attack enemies who try to approach them with their bone staves.
The Kappa, who resided in the waters, possesses a plate filled with demonic aura on his head. He may not be as strong as before, but he is capable of manipulating magical balls.
A monk who can summon Lantern Spirits. He abandoned his religion due to indulging in the power of demonic aura.

A friend of the Corrupt Monk. The Nihilation Monk devotes himself to monasticism and has developed extrasensory through demonic aura, which allows him to light flicker to any location to steal life from enemies.

Due to the fact that the Fiddler Crabs were chased to the shore by Youruhime-Maru, they are always hiding while making magical balls. Being reluctant to work for Yoruhime-Maru, they will just flee upon spotting any danger!
The masters of the Catfish Warriors, they are so proficient in swordsmanship that they can unleash aura of their swords.
The experienced Rogue Henchman gains behemoth powers through activating their bloodlines, allowing them to use their gigantic shields skillfully.
The Elite Monk, with powerful demonic aura, is the leader of the Nihilation Monks. Besides possessing the ability to life steal, he is able to heal others by life steal as well.

The battleship is made up of the remains of a turreted ship that was built a thousand years ago. Although the battleship has undergone various changes, its alchemy power is still as strong as ever. The battleship of Yoruhime-Maru is much sturdier as it is further transformed by demonic aura.

Each weapon has its own attribute, and the <color=blue>inscriptions</color> on the weapon also bring more diverse enhancement to the weapons.
Talent is an important part of the hero's growth. By consuming soul essence, you can activate various powerful talent for the hero.
There are many powerful scrolls hidden behind the “glowing wall”; now you have ability to search for them.
When two weapons have the Gemini Inscriptions at the same time, they will active a very powerful attribute.
As a highly skilled man, craftsman can enhance weapons or reforge weapons' gemini inscriptions.
Falling does not mean failure, the hero can be reborn by consuming soul essence.
Some weapons have special skill, click $<weaponskill> to use.
Uncle Bao prepared some weapons for you in Longling Tomb-Entrance, maybe you can take one before setting off.
Challenge Event is the risk that may appear at any time in an adventure, but it also means unexpected goods.
Horned Beetles often come in groups, making AoE weapons and skills very effective against them.

Desert Coyotes are low to the ground and well camouflaged, making them harder to spot. They will often spread out to attack players from different directions. The minimap can be used to help keep track of them.

Desert Worms fire a constant stream of projectiles which home in on you, making it harder to fight other enemies simultaneously. Constantly moving sideways while firing back can quickly take them down. They don't move, making them an easy target.
Grenadier's explosives will detonate a few seconds after being thrown. Explosion range will be shown to help you avoid the impact.
Flame Grenadier's explosives will explode into a fire pool that inflicts Burning, dealing Fire DMG over time. Keep out of the explosive's radius and the fire pool to avoid the sustained DMG.
Lightning Grenadier's explosives are capable of stunning. Be extra careful to avoid the explosive's radius when other enemies are nearby.

Poison Grenadier's explosives leave a lingering corrosion pool that inflicts Decay, slowing you down and making it harder to dodge attacks. Be careful to avoid the explosive's radius and the corrosion pool.
Foot Soldiers only have melee attacks, which can be easily avoided by sidestepping or dashing.
Spearmen only attempt to use melee attacks. Watch out for Spearmen's charged attack, which hits in a wide area in the direction they're facing.
Lightning can be dangerous when surrounded by enemies, but Lightning Swordsmen only have melee attacks, which can be easily avoided by sidestepping or dashing.
Their crossbow fires in volleys before taking a break. Take cover while they are firing, or keep your distance to avoid their projectiles.
Shielded Crossbowmen use a metal shield to prevent DMG from projectiles, but their shields will break after taking enough DMG. Aiming around or above the shield will be effective as well.
Bandit Gunner's rifle fires in bursts before repositioning. Take cover while they are firing, or keep distance as they do to avoid projectiles.

Catfish Grunts use a shield to prevents DMG from projectiles. Their shields will break after absorbing enough DMG. Their darts can accurately launch in bulk. Weapons with Lightning DMG will be the best assistance.

Dark-faced Bandits will growl before charging forward and slamming the ground. They can also launch powerful explosive shells at you from a long distance. Flanking and hitting the scars on its back can eliminate it faster. Corrosion damage can quickly break their armor.

Horseheads are slow, but have a large, powerful shield that blocks projectiles. When attacking, their body will be exposed briefly, providing an opportunity to strike. Moreover, grenades and explosive weapons are recommended.

Rogue Villains move close to you before lining up and firing their shotgun. Either kill them before they get close enough, or dash to the side as they raise their weapon. Taking cover as they fire can also protect you.

When being attacked, Rogue Henchmen will raise their large shields that block projectiles, however, they won't raise their shields while moving. Keep distance and flank them, they can be briefly knocked back when their shields take enough DMG.

Yaksha of the Seas will swing their club before slamming it on the ground, creating a shock wave. Avoid getting close to it, since their melee attack is much stronger. Weapons with Corrosion DMG will help eliminate them.
Their crossbow fires in volleys before taking a break. Take cover while they are firing, or keep your distance to avoid their projectiles. Lightning DMG can help break through their shield.
Bandit Hermits like to turn invisible. Keep an eye out for their outlines to avoid getting surprised by their powerful Lightning weapons.

Catfish Man will either charge up their shot and fire a stunning arrow, which knocks players back, or will fire a series of arrows. Take cover until they stop firing then shoot back, or keep your distance to help with avoiding their projectiles.

Longbowmen fire projectiles that home in on the player, taking a break afterwards. Their shots make a distinct sound, so take cover when hearing it. Skills and weapons with corrosion element are more effective than aiming at their weaknesses.

Bandit Tacticians will mark you with a red laser sight before firing. Red warning blinks around screen edges will tell you that you are being targeted. Their powerful shot can be avoided by moving or dashing, skills and weapons with corrosion damage will help with eliminating them.

Bandit Retainers fire bursts that home in on the player, taking a break afterwards. They are also capable of teleporting, making them unable to be hit briefly. Weapons and skills that can freeze or knock them back will help keep them still.
White Sharks possess chain hooks, which will prevent your movement and drag you towards them. Don't get caught, or you may receive critical DMG from them.

Rogue Arsonists use short range flamethrowers to deal high DMG. Either focus on killing them quickly before they reach you, or keep moving away from dead ends. Their oil barrel on their back can be exploited to kill them quickly. Lightning weapons are suggested.

The Octopus wields a powerful weapon that fires a constant stream of corrosive projectiles, which can slow you down. Their weakness is hard to hit and they are difficult to interrupt while firing. Keep your distance to win more time to dodge the projectiles.

Watch out for twin mortars on Arrogant Lobsters, which fire barrages of fireballs through the air, leaving fire pools when they impact the ground. Keep moving, and watch where you step afterwards. If necessary, the fireballs can be shot down.
Bombers will charge at you and then self-destruct, and their heads will drop & explode briefly after death. Use AoE weapons or skills to annihilate them in group, or dash out of their blast radius.

Flame Bombers will charge at you and then self-destruct, and their heads will drop & explode briefly after death, leaving a fire area on the ground. Use AoE weapons or skills to annihilate them in group, or dash out of their blast radius.

Lightning Bombers will charge at you and then self-destruct, and their heads will drop & explode briefly after death. Be extra careful when you are surrounded by enemies, since you will be stunned if you are affected by the explosion. Use AoE weapons or skills to annihilate them in group, or dash out of their blast radius.

Poison Bombers will charge at you and then self-destruct, and their heads will drop & explode briefly after death, leaving a corrosion area. Use AoE weapons or skills to annihilate them in group, or dash out of their blast radius.
Their spears are thrown in an overhead arc and have near-perfect accuracy, making it harder to avoid. A reasonable distance or dashing is required to avoid taking DMG.
Fire Lizards can launch fire orbs from a long distance, creating a fire area upon hitting the ground. Keep in mind where they shot, and target at their heads to kill them swiftly.
Lightning Lizards can launch lightning orbs from a long distance, creating a lightning area upon hitting the ground. Keep in mind where they shot, and target at their heads to kill them swiftly.

Kappas will launch elemental orbs that home in on the player. The element is random, making the orbs highly versatile and dangerous when applying elemental effects. If necessary, the orbs can be shot down. AoE attacks can destroy all of the Kappa's orbs at once.

Corrupt Monks summon Exploding Lantern Spirits, and can create dangerous swarms if not killed quickly. However, they do not attack players directly, making them harmless without other enemies nearby. Don't forget to clean up the fireballs that appear on its death.

Move away from Nihilation Monks when you see them teleport close to you, since they will create a large damaging aura. Be careful with the magic orbs they create, which are slow but deal enormous DMG.

Umbrella Spirits are highly agile with a small weak spot, which can make them hard to hit and kill quickly. Watch out for their orb attacks, which can deal several hits in quick succession if you fail to avoid.
Fiddler Crabs create small water balls when in close range, and they are delicate. Any AoE weapons are capable of dealing with them.
Watch out for the Elite Beetle's charging indication and dash out of the way quickly. The group of Horned Beetles it summons can be quickly taken care of with AoE attacks.

Take cover or stay far away when the Elite Catfish Warrior performs their constant blade waves. Be careful when they start charging, since they will rapidly close in on your position to perform a slash. Dash away before they reach you.

The Elite Horsehead is slow, but has a large, powerful shield that blocks projectiles. When attacking, their body will be exposed briefly, providing an opportunity to strike. Occasionally it will summon Crossbowmen to assist it. Killing them first can make the fight much easier.

When being attacked, Elite Henchmen will raise their large shield to block projectiles, and they will not lower their shields while firing. However, shields cannot protect them when moving. Keep distance and flank them. Try to look for a high location to protect you.

Watch out for the massive fireballs it channels. A large indicator will appear where the fireball is going to land. It also creates smaller elemental orbs which leave elemental areas. Remember where the areas are created and keep away from them while dealing with other attacks.

Move away from them when you see them teleport close to you, since the large damaging area they create will steal your life and heal their them. Be careful with the magic orbs they create, which are slow but deal decent DMG.

Lu Wu has powerful attacks which often require dashing to avoid. Sometimes Lu Wu will attempt to recharge its Shield, which Lightning DMG can be used to quickly tear it apart. Attacks can be blocked by the large pillars in the room, if dashing cannot be performed.
The Crystal is Gluttony's weakness. Keep your distance, and be aware of its large AoE attacks.

Ichthyosaurus Offspring is heavily protected, only the mouth and tail are vulnerable. When it fires beams from mouth, running in the opposite direction at a close distance can help avoid it. The corrosive balls it fires can be shot down before landing. Weapons with Corrosion DMG will help as well.

Golem's body is heavily protected, only the energy core in its chest is vulnerable. The laser is extremely hard to avoid, hiding behind a pillar can prevent you from taking DMG. The homing rocks it summons can be shot down or blocked by pillars. Stay away from rocks that are glowing, as they are about to explode.

The ship's cannons explode upon destruction, filling the battlefield with projectiles. Once water barrier is up it will fire multiple artilleries, which have indicators along the ground where it’s aiming. Firing a shell from the central cannon is the only way to break its barrier.

Homing tornadoes can be destroyed by leading them into sand vortexes. The locations of these traps are marked on the minimap. When Wind God becomes invincible, leading it into sand vortexes can disrupt the sandstorm it created. Avoid vortex or you will be trapped and take constant DMG.
Observe the terrain carefully to avoid Needlebit Trap. You can use Dash to pass through traps if necessary.
Pay attention to observe the regularity of the rolling stones, and look for the interval of the rolling stones to pass through
Pay attention to the spitting interval of the trap, or simply dodge it. You can use Dash to pass through traps if necessary.
Pay attention to the spitting interval of the trap, or simply dodge it. You can use Dash to pass through traps if necessary.
Pay attention to avoid traps. You can also use Dash to pass through traps if necessary.
Stay away from explosive barrels, or destroy them in advance.
Press {0} to improve talents by consuming <color=#FFCA00>Soul Essence</color>

Ascensions determine the direction of growth of this adventure. Level 3 Ascensions have powerful additional effects. Reasonably matching Ascensions, Occult Scrolls and weapons can help you go further.
The crack leads to the Vault! You can enter the Vault to explore the lost treasures after breaking the crack.

What's up! Gunfire Reborn Update Roadmap 2024 is now updated.\nIf you have any problems or suggestions during the game, feel free to contact us with in-game feedback function. We will consider carefully on every feedback. Have fun in Gunfire Reborn!
If you don't have a strong set of Occult Scrolls or Ascensions, taking cover is your best option.
Enemies have a very low hit rate on moving targets.
When a horde of Horned Beetles rush over, don't panic, they can be easily dispatched with a grenade or your starting weapon.
The Bomber's self-detonation has a delay, so don't panic when it's close, use your dash to quickly retreat to avoid the explosion.
The Horsehead only shows itself when attacking, take advantage of this and strike accordingly!
The Longbowman's damage is very high, but his projectile speed is very low. Moving left or right, or finding cover, can help you avoid his tracking arrows.
Using your dash at the right time can help you avoid most of Lu Wu's attacks.
The weakness of the Dark-faced Bandit is on his back and he will become vulnerable after charging.
Don't be silly to face the fierce attack of Desert Worms, find a cover!
The Corrupt Monk is not very dangerous, but the Exploding Lantern Spirits that he summons are.
There are 3 different types of defenses, Flesh, Armor, and Shield. You can tell each apart by the color of the HP bar.
For the monsters with a Flesh advantage (red HP bar), Fire DMG can be the most effective solution.
For the monsters with an Armor advantage (yellow HP bar), Corrosive DMG can be the most effective solution.
For the monsters with a Shield advantage (blue HP bar), Lightning DMG can be the most effective solution.
A combination of Burn and Shock can trigger Manipulation, which confuses the target to attack nearby allies.
A combination of Burn and Decay can trigger Combustion, which deals AoE damage to the target and enemies nearby.
A combination of Shock and Decay can trigger Miasma, which deals DOT damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Normal damage can be converted into Fire, Corrosive, or Lightning damage by a weapon inscription.
Ascensions, solid weapons, and Occult Scrolls are absolutely necessary to an effective play-style!
Each hero has a different play-style, you can preview them and their powers to apply better Ascensions in the combat.
Pay attention to the glowing crack in the wall, it's the entrance to the Vault.
The Vault is your primary source of Occult Scrolls besides chests.
Peddler will offer an Occult Scroll discount if you have "Haggle" talent.
The Peddler can provide you with supplies, weapons, and even sometimes an Occult Scroll in the battlefield!

Corrosion DMG deals 50% extra damage to Monster with Armor (Yellow HP bar).<color=#a89c9c><size=8>

<size=18>「Corrosion DMG has a chance to deal Decay Effect that slows down enemies' movement speed. 
*A combination of Decay Effect and Burning Effect will generate a Fusion Effect called<sprite name=baozha>Explosion.      *A combination of Decay Effect and Shock Effect will generate a Fusion Effect called <sprite name=duqi>Miasma.」

Take cover or seek higher ground when they perform their wave attack, since it is hard to dodge even when being far away. Keep your distance when they run towards you to avoid their melee attacks, and dash out of the way once they get close enough.
The Elite Arsonist has a long-range acid thrower that can inflict Decay, making their targets harder to escape. Being above or below them can help avoid their attacks.

The twin mortars on elite lobsters can be temporarily disabled if they take enough damage. The fireball barrage launches one final massive fireball at the end, so be sure to move away quickly if you take cover from the barrage.
Aberrations among Horned Beetles, whose mutations enable them to absorb even more evil energy to become humongous and resilient.

Elite outlaws who love poison more than flames. Their larger frames haven't diminished their nimbleness one bit.

Restoring or losing HP within the last 10 seconds increases Max Armor by the same amount of HP change (the max bonus is determined by your Max HP). Restoring or losing Armor within the last 10 seconds increases weapon DMG and Skill DMG by the same percentage of Armor change (the max bonus is determined by your Max Armor).

The relationship between actual response speed and stick displacement, which influences analog stick sensitivity within registered range.

Standard: 
Simple curve ratio between the speed of analog sticks and ADS.

Linear:
 Direct ratio between the speed of analog sticks and ADS.

Dynamic: 
Reverse S-curve mapping for more accurate aim rate control.

Fine Aim: 
Specialized for small, gradual adjustments.

High Velocity: 
Quick response for the very even-handed.

Fishing experts wandering in the Hyperborean area. Their skills in fishing are only matched by their ability to manipulate explosives.
An agile Snow monkey who possesses extremely keen ears and usually appears in groups.

The white bear, once guarded the Jokul peacefully, has become extremely ferocious after being corroded by the demonic aura.
The Elusive Stalkers are agile and always hide in the shadows, making them hard to track.
The Thunderous Stalkers always use the power of thunder and lightning to ambush enemies in the dark. They are one of the most deadly creatures on the Hyperborean Jokul.
The aborigine living on the Hyperborean Jokul. Although their behavior is rather predictable, they overwhelm rivals with their numbers and cannot be easily ignored.
The most troublesome combination on the Hyperborean Jokul. Even if one has fallen, the other can still fight relentlessly.
A shorty troublemaker. Mutated yellow penguins always equip themselves with a strange weapon that can endlessly spray frozen air.
A mysterious aircraft that appears in the aurora. It can transmit stored energy to other monsters and provide them with a steady stream of life energy.
The enigmatic elites among Thunderous Stalkers. They can conjure identical mirror images to fight together.
In addition to being brave in battle when at an advantage, the most troublesome aspect of the Elite Mandrill Cavalry is his tactics in retreat when the battle turns against him.

The Pole Monarch who perches on top of the Jokul can not only strafe with a variety of weapons transformed from the Demonic Aura, but can also quickly approach and slash its enemy with an ice sword. In combat, the Pole Monarch can take advantage of spiritual aura to enhance itself. All your firepower will be needed to achieve a quick victory.

Over the Northern skyline, a purple aura spread all over the sky. It was supposed to be an auspicious sign, but as the sky became dark, the earth became darker, and the Evil Spirit tormented the continent, people started to realize that it was the source of the ominous disasters. The rumors say the unknown visitor from the Spiritual Realm can devour the whole world and overshadow the Sun, so it was named GLUTTONY. More secrets remain to be found by any late-comers.

Innocent and pure drawing, with the dream come true. Momo is an endlessly inspired youth. His fantasy power manifests as an ink domain around him, allowing him to paint at will. Facing a surge of attacks, he can wield his brush to neutralize threats or transform into an Ink Spirit, using himself as the brush. Additionally, the weapons with special skills in his agile hands will unleash greater power.

Where is this place? Did you save me?
Here is the Tavern. Why did you go there?
Ahh... Thank you for saving me! I heard that there were monsters gathering, so I wanted to go there to investigate. I didn't expect...
Are you looking for that too?
The Longling Tomb was once a place to seal demonic aura, but now it is perilous because the demonic aura has gone rampant.
I am totally at odds with the demonic aura! After all the hours of effort to get the clues, I will never give up.
If you insist on going, take this. It may help you.
The spiritual aura seems to favour you more, so it saved you from the edge of life and death.
Do you still remember the <color=yellow>jade pendant</color> I gave you the other day?
That jade pendant can connect with your meridian inside your body and help you refine <color=#FFCA00>Soul Essence</color>, and has the effect of protecting your soul.
After years of disaster plaguing this land caused by YORUHIME-MARU, it deserved to be taken down.
Only when the demonic aura is completely extinguished can we stop the monsters corrupted by it.
Wait... Do you think YORUHIME-MARU is not the real culprit?
The demonic aura is most likely congregating in the same area instead of dissipating. I am afraid that it will come back.
I have to investigate it further.
I can't believe that my partner, who had fought alongside me in the past, is the absolute bane of this tragedy.
He had only himself to blame for this disaster—no need to be so chagrined at yourself, Uncle Bao.
This demonic aura is capable of invading the mind of any creature and corrupting their mentality, making them a beast of evil within. It shouldn't exist in the world.
Anyway, the world should be at peace now.
It's strange that despite the demonic aura causing such chaos, the Spirit Realm did nothing to oppose it.
The Spirit Realm may be facing a more sinister crisis...
Concentrate all your fire on the Pole Monarch!
A goblet corrupted by demonic aura, which only grants a minority of mysterious energy.

Iron Wing fights alongside Nona. After Iron Wing is knocked down, there is a 12s revive time. If it is not successfully revived within the time, it requires 20s for reassembly. Iron Wing inherits the Skill DMG bonuses from Nona.

Use the 'Interrupt Charging' key (assigned to the middle mouse button by default) to switch Iron Wing between Strike Mode and Fire Mode. Strike Mode: Melee attacks. Fire Mode: Remain in place and shoot [Hardwood Missile] to perform ranged attacks.

This season, we have introduced a brand new mechanism - Arcane Ascension, which enhances occult scrolls to provide assistance in battles. Meanwhile, we have prepared some season rewards for you to obtain.

Each season comes with season tasks. Completing tasks will grant soul essence and increase your season levels. Upon reaching certain season levels, special rewards can be obtained. You can view the details by clicking on the season icon.

Only available in Nightmare and Reincarnation difficulty. At the start of battles, you can choose one from: Thunderous Steps, Elemental Pulses and Thorny Carapace. You will then obtain the Arcane Ascensions through boss drops and multiple-choice chests.
Season 1 - [Arcane Ascensions]. Each season has its unique gameplay, bidding players farewell after the season ends.

Thunder roars, an unknown power scattered on the mortal realm, seemingly originating from occult scrolls. After extensive exploration, it was discovered that there were three scrolls that could absorb this power. Thus, the era of [Arcane Ascensions] starts from now on...
There are Arcane Jades with three different qualities
The jade contains mysterious power. Pick up to obtain 1 Arcane Ascension
The jade contains mysterious power. Pick up to select 1 of 2 Arcane Ascensions
The jade contains mysterious power. Pick up to select 1 of 3 Arcane Ascensions
Complete tasks can level up season grades and obtain corresponding rewards

During the adventure, you may encounter the Training Master, from whom you can accept tasks to receive blessings and curses. Upon completion, curses are removed. (Vault and boss stages do not count towards progress.)
Replace a random <color=#5ADF89>normal inscription</color=#5ADF89> of the selected weapon with a <color=#7DCAF7>rare inscription</color=#7DCAF7>.
Replace a random non-exclusive inscription of the selected weapon with an <color=#FF8500> exclusive inscription </color=#FF8500>.
Season 2 - [Destiny Mechanism]. Each season has its unique gameplay, bidding players farewell after the season ends.

This season, we introduce a brand-new gameplay named [Destiny Mechanism]. Players can play a flexible and powerful device and freely combine Almighty Core to customize their combat style. Additionally, Seasonal Rewards are also available for folks to obtain.

Available only in Nightmare and Reincarnation. At the beginning, you can choose one from Datura, Hound and Matrix as the mechanism for this game. Almighty Core will drop during the combat, which can be equipped in the backpack to enhance the device's abilities.

As the demonic aura surged more fiercely, the pressure on the folks also increased. One day, Nona returned from visiting her sect and brought back three devices overflowing with mysterious energy. Once connected with the internal spiritual energy, those devices will unleash incredible power...
Almighty Core can be equipped in the backpack interface to enhance the the device. There are three kinds of Almighty Core: General, Mechanism-Exclusive, and Hero-Exclusive
Can be equipped with all three mechanisms, popular and practical.
Only the specific mechanism can be equipped, possessing incredible abilities. Some Almighty Core may even be mutually repulsive and cannot be equipped at the same time.
Closely related to the selected Hero and Device, better compatible with both of their abilities.
In some stages, Dimension Portal will appear: summoning enemies continuously via costing its own HP. Destroy the Dimension Portal as soon as possible is the wise choice.

Almighty cores are categorized into General, Hero-Exclusive and Mechanism-Exclusive. Initially, you can equip up to 3 Almighty Cores, with no restrictions on the types. After defeating a boss, an additional slot will be unlocked, and up to 6 equipable slots. Almighty Cores can be installed or removed at any time.
· Total 10 types of General Almighty Core. They can be equipped with any mechanism.
· Total 3 types of mechanism, each mechanism has 10 types of Almighty cores including Hero-Exclusive and Mechanism-Exclusive

Dimension Portals will appear in certain stages and continuously summon enemies. The Dimension Portal will slowly lose its HP, and mechanisms can deal more damage to it. It would be wise to destroy the Dimension Portal as soon as possible.
You have 10 level 1 General Almighty Cores, click to assemble.
You will revive after beating the Boss

Final DMG taken reduced by 60%. Upon lethal DMG, save as 1 HP and reduce 2s of transformation duration

Generate a ring-shaped area of 8 to 16 meters around self, dealing 75 Ink-DMG every 0.5s to enemies within. During Ink Form, [Ink Domain] will be changed to a 5 meters solid circle
Up to 30 points. -2 <color=#6BDCDC>"Ink Point"</color> per second if Momo is without Ink Spirit status

This season introduces a new gameplay - Demon Vanquishment. Defeat then subdue powerful demonized enemies and fight alongside unique demon spirits. Seasonal rewards await you to acquire as well.

Available only in Nightmare and Reincarnation difficulties. Encounter special demonized enemies during your adventure. Defeat and subdue them to obtain spirit eggs. Hatch to get demon spirits that follow the player. Each demon spirit have different attributes and abilities with different affixes.

Terrifying monsters emitting dreadful demon aura have appeared. Heroes are summoned to subdue them. After a fierce battle, the demon aura condenses into an egg. Upon closer inspection, the egg exudes spiritual energy and divine light, hinting at a mystical creature within...
Encounter demonized enemies during your adventure. Defeat and subdue them to obtain spirit eggs. Hatch to get demon spirits that follow the player

Powerful demonized enemies appear with overwhelming demon aura! After being defeated, they enter a weak state. Players must seize this opportunity to subdue them, or they will reborn. Besides, there are even stronger and special demonized monsters
A mystical creature that can fight alongside players, with innate affixes enhancing demon spirit abilities.
Demon spirits are categorized into seven types: Light Armor, Mage, Archer, Guardian, Heavy Armor, Elementalist, and Minikins. Each demon spirit has distinct combat type
Talent effects automatically unlock as the season level increases. Season talents are only effective in matches with 'Demon Subjugation,' and their effects are closely related to this gameplay.
New spiritual blessings related to season gameplay. They can only be drawn in matches with 'Demon Subjugation,' enhancing player abilities related to the season gameplay.

Combine two demon spirits to obtain a new demon spirit that retains some of their attributes. Through spirit fusion, players can experiment with more attribute combinations to cultivate a demon spirit that suits them better.
· Demon spirit warehouse and spirit awakening

After an adventure, players can store demon spirits in the demon spirit warehouse. In the preparation interface, a demon spirit from the warehouse can be brought into battle. Attributes of demon spirits brought from the warehouse will be sealed and require consuming a demon spirit with the same attributes to awaken.
The demonized enemy has been subdued
Season 3 - [Demon Vanquishment]. Each season has its unique gameplay, bidding players farewell after the season ends.

Regular play or season tasks can obtain season experience to level up and achieve certain levels to claim season rewards. Players can continue leveling up for higher records if all unique season rewards are unlocked. Season avatar frame will record the highest level for commemoration.

Starlight shines, fate reverses, Boss Trial On! To counter the growing demon aura, heroes harness astral power to further activate the potential and resonance of Occult Scrolls, elevating Spiritual Link to Star Link. Zi Xiao's junior also becomes a Star Envoy, aiding players in their adventure.
Richer and stronger Link effects will be available in game. Players select a Star Link Template before the game begins to activate powerful Star Link effects during the game.
Powers from other Bosses will transcend time and space in BOSS Stage, be cautious!

Temporary Backpack: Players have 3 Temporary Backpacks for storing Occult Scrolls temporarily . Occult Scrolls in the Temporary Backpack will not be activated and will not conflict with those in the backpack.
Blank Scrolls: Obtain a certain number of Blank Scrolls during the match. They have no effect themselves, mainly used as cost material at Star Envoy.
Mysterious Occult Scrolls: Rarely obtained during matches. Recall to obtain an Occult Scroll of the same quality. Might have unexpected uses?
New NPC—Star Envoy will assist in battle during the Season. It offers functions like Link Activation and Starlight Reception to help activate Links. Check in-game for details.

Season 5 - [Arcane Talisman]. Each season has its unique gameplay, bidding players farewell after the season ends.

Demonic mists rise, tainting the world. As wind and cloud surges, the spirits of all beings transform into mysterious Talismans and Power Gems, scattered across the land. Legend whispers that when these artifacts unite, they will unleash wonderful spiritual power. Adventurers embark on a new journey to obtain this power, but monsters corrupted by the mists are coveting this power as well...

You can collect various Talismans and Power Gems during the adventure. Try to combine them and experience their unique abilities. Meanwhile, enemies will be enhanced by Talismans, so get ready to challenge them.
Different Talismans have distinct passive effects and various inlay slots.
Power Gems must be inlaid into Talismans to play their role. The Power Gem will be triggered after all the Conditions on the Talisman are triggered, providing an additional boost to players.

In this Season, we introduce a brand new gameplay: Fortune's Roll. Acquire diverse Dice, roll for the best outcomes, and equip them to harness their immense power. Seasonal rewards await you to acquire as well.

Available only in Nightmare and Reincarnation Difficulty. Fortune Merchant will appear during the adventure, selling a variety of Dice. Some Enhanced Monsters have also obtained Dice blessings, making them even stronger.
Season 6: Fortune's Roll. Each Season features its own unique Gameplay, and will be temporarily unavailable to players once the Season ends.

Fortune cycles, great luck descends. Within the unseen, Dice containing unique powers of the world are born and scattered throughout perilous realms. It is said that those who obtain the dice can use their luck to turn danger into safety, change fate, and even accomplish the impossible. Heroes set out in search of these opportunities. Meanwhile, Monsters blessed by dice luck have become even more difficult to handle...
During your adventure, you can obtain various enhanced Dice. By combining them, you gain unique and diverse abilities. At the same time, players must challenge enemies enhanced by Dice.

Different Dice provide various buffs. Equip to receive the buffs. When you obtain a Dice, its number is unknown and must be determined by rolling. The higher the roll, the stronger the buff. To get higher-value Dice, you can use various Fortune Card to influence the roll. You have three Dice slots at first. Each time you defeat a Boss, you can Unlock a new Dice slot.
When applied to Dice, Fortune Card affects roll outcomes and grants other mysterious effects
The new NPC Fortune Merchant will help out in Battle during the Season. It offer all kinds of Dice to assistance players in leveling up quickly. check the in-game Expedition for more details
Occasionally, when entering a new room, you may encounter a Season Room Challenge where all Monsters are empowered by Special Dice effects. Handle with care.
